situation: J felt overwhelmed by the loud music and unexpected noises from the school talent show. She covered her ears and started screaming out of frustration.
action: The teacher aide approached J but didn't have any noise-cancelling headphones or alternative strategies to offer. They asked J to quiet down, hoping she would calm herself.
effect: J continued to scream as the noise persisted, and the lack of appropriate support heightened her anxiety. This disrupted the talent show momentarily and resulted in J being even more distressed.
